connector.description: Receive events from Amazon DynamoDB Streams.

camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.tab.name: camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.table
camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.tab.description: The name of the DynamoDB table.

camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.acc.name: camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.accessKey
camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.acc.description: The access key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.sec.name: camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.secretKey
camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.sec.description: The secret key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.str.name: camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.streamIteratorType
camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.str.description: Defines where in the DynamoDB stream to start getting records. There are two enums and the value can be one of FROM_LATEST and FROM_START. Note that using FROM_START can cause a significant delay before the stream has caught up to real-time.

camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.use.name: camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.useDefaultCredentialsProvider
camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.use.description: If true, the DynamoDB client loads credentials through a default credentials provider. If false, it uses the basic authentication method (access key and secret key).

camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.use.name: camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.useProfileCredentialsProvider
camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.use.description: Set whether the DynamoDB client should expect to load credentials through a profile credentials provider.

camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.use.name: camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.useSessionCredentials
camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.use.description: Set whether the DynamoDB client should expect to use Session Credentials. This is useful in situation in which the user needs to assume a IAM role for doing operations in DynamoDB.

camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.pro.name: camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.profileCredentialsName
camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.pro.description: If using a profile credentials provider this parameter will set the profile name.

camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.ses.name: camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.sessionToken
camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.ses.description: Amazon AWS Session Token used when the user needs to assume a IAM role.

camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.uri.name: camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.uriEndpointOverride
camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.uri.description: The overriding endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also select the `overrideEndpoint` option.

camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.ove.name: camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.overrideEndpoint
camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.ove.description: Select this option to override the endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also provide a URI for the `uriEndpointOverride` option.

camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.del.name: camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.delay
camel.kamelet.aws-ddb-streams-source.del.description: The number of milliseconds before the next poll from the database.
